resources.string: You\'re being timed out due to late response from the server side, please try again.
Uh oh..Looks like you are no longer connected to the Internet, reconnect and try again.
Unexpected error occurred, please try again.
An error has occurred during request, please try again.
The server encountered a temporary error and could not lead you to your destination, please try again.
İsteğinizi şuanda gerçekleştiremiyoruz.\nLütfen daha sonra tekrar deneyin!
Lütfen bağlantı ayarlarınızı kontrol edin ve tekrar deneyin.
